message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $18000.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am only able to offer $15000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. While $15000 is tempting, I'm looking for a bit closer to my initial asking price. I'm willing to come down to $16500. Let's see if we can bridge the gap!

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still not able to meet the price of $16500. I would like to offer $15500 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your range.
